pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Kernel Smoothing Methods for Mixed Data Types // Nonparametric (and semiparametric) kernel methods that seamlessly handle a mix of continuous, unordered, and ordered factor data types. We would like to gratefully acknowledge support from the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC, https://www.nserc-crsng.gc.ca/), the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada (SSHRC, https://www.sshrc-crsh.gc.ca/), and the Shared Hierarchical Academic Research Computing Network (SHARCNET, https://sharcnet.ca/).
